title: Skin Name Typo

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Instead of having the word "Aquamarine" written for teemo's blue chroma, its written"Aquarmaine".

replies.body: Eeep! Nice catch! I'll poke our store friends about it. :)

Could you help me. I found that I "own" riot kayle...but I don't remember buying it or getting it in hextech or getting gifted it. If you could get someone to look into it please so that I don't get banned or something like that.

> [{quoted}](name=BladeSteel,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=YlL55FAx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-30T22:43:18.649+0000)
>
> Could you help me. I found that I "own" riot kayle...but I don't remember buying it or getting it in hextech or getting gifted it. If you could get someone to look into it please so that I don't get banned or something like that.

You certainly won't get banned for it. :) I don't personally have access to your account, but player support does, and would be happy to help you! If you [shoot them a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) they'd be able to tell you how and when you obtained the skin!
